title.content: Position Tracking: Keyword Rank Tracker Tool | Semrush

metaDescription.content: Track daily Google rankings for mobile and desktop. Analyze SERP features (Featured snippet, local map pack, AMP etc). Create beautiful PDF reports.

content.html:
Position Tracking

Monitor the rankings of your site and your competitors on a daily basis.

Track any location or device type.

Already registered?Log in

Discover potential opportunities

Analyze SERPs by target keyword and pinpoint each SERP Feature that your site may occupy

Measure your SEO or PPC efforts

Measure your SEO or PPC efforts In addition to tracking your keyword positions, you can also track overall visibility and share of voice

Discover who competes with you for the target keywords

Semrush helps you find competitors that are targeting and ranking for the same keywords as you. You can also find competitors for each location you track.

Stay on top of any changes in positions

Set up custom notifications that will alert you in case of critical position changes that may require immediate action.

Automate your reporting about the progress

Create beautiful and detailed reports using the built-in PDF editor or integrate your project into a Google Data Studio dashboard.

Start tracking keywords now!

Already registered?Log in

FAQ

How often is the data in the Position Tracking tool updated?
What external integrations are available for the Position Tracking tool?
How many Position Tracking campaigns can I run for my website?

structuredData.name: Semrush
structuredData.description: Semrush - online visibility management and content marketing SaaS platform

mainEntity.name: How often is the data in the Position Tracking tool updated?

acceptedAnswer.text: In general, the information is updated every 24-48 hours. If you need to track keywords more closely or know when exactly a particular position was updated, you can consult the Position Tracking dashboard. Note that these updates are automatic, and cannot be scheduled.

mainEntity.name: What external integrations are available for the Position Tracking tool?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Position Tracking tool features integrations with Google Analytics (allowing you to gather data on every single keyword your site is ranking for on Google), and Google Data Studio (allowing you to pull organic and paid data from an existing Position Tracking campaign).

mainEntity.name: How many Position Tracking campaigns can I run for my website?

acceptedAnswer.text: It’s currently only possible to run one Position Tracking campaign per project. However, with a Guru or Business account, you can configure multiple targets in the same campaign, with Guru allowing you to focus on up to 10 locations or devices per project, and Business up to 5,000.
